metadataAttributes.Title: Capstone: Creating A Sustainability Proposal
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Congratulations on reaching the Capstone Class of the Become a Sustainable Business Change Agent specialization.  The class will help you apply material from the previous three classes.  We have developed a case about a hypothetical ski resort that offers lots of opportunities to develop sustainability recommendations.  A second option is do develop a proposal for a change in your company or organization.  Or you can do both the case and your own proposal.
